00046 #ifndef __CVMX_PKO3_RESOURCES_H__
00047 #define __CVMX_PKO3_RESOURCES_H__
00048 
00049 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00050 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00051 extern "C" {
00052 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * Allocate or reserve contiguous list of PKO queues.
00057  *
00058  * @param node is the node number for PKO queues.
00059  * @param level is the PKO queue level.
00060  * @param owner is the owner of PKO queue resources.
00061  * @param base_queue is the PKO queue base number(specify -1 to allocate).
00062  * @param num_queues is the number of PKO queues that have to be reserved or allocated.
00063  * @return returns queue_base if successful or -1 on failure.
00064  */
00065 extern int cvmx_pko_alloc_queues(int node, int level, int owner, int base_queue, int num_queues);
00066 
00067 /**
00068  * Free an allocated/reserved PKO queues for a certain level and owner
00069  *
00070  * @param node on which to allocate/reserve PKO queues
00071  * @param level of PKO queue
00072  * @param owner of reserved/allocated resources
00073  * @return 0 on success, -1 on failure
00074  */
00075 extern int cvmx_pko_free_queues(int node, int level, int owner);
00076 
00077 extern int __cvmx_pko3_dq_param_setup(unsigned node);
00078 
00079 int cvmx_pko3_num_level_queues(enum cvmx_pko3_level_e level);
00080 
00081 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00082 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00083 }
00084 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00085 #endif
00086 #endif /* __CVMX_PKO3_RESOURCES_H__ */
